basic_info.author: Gary Gregory
basic_info.message:
CSVPrinter.printRecords(ResultSet) knows how to use CSVFormat's maxRows

- Add CSVFormat.Builder.setMaxRows(long)
- Add CSVFormat.getMaxRows()
basic_info.message_subject: CSVPrinter.printRecords(ResultSet) knows how to use CSVFormat's maxRows
